title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3+4
description: Designed new system-level features for this release! Pitched and implemented a data-driven NPC system that enabled efficient creation, placement, and configuration of NPCs. Created multiple AI behaviors for this tool. Crafted a player progression system within an existing framework, writing design documentation and overseeing implementation. Worked with the animation team to create several new charactrer special tricks. Collaborated with gameplay design to create in-game challenges.

title: Grand Theft Auto VI
description: Created various types of open-world content for the upcoming entry in the Grand Theft Auto franchise. Collaboratively brainstormed unique event concepts. Detailed prerequisites in design documentation for artists, animators, engineers, and writers. Prototyped and iterated on events, both in C# and in an in-house visual scripting tool. Additionally, helped build components for use in the visual scripting tool.

title: Red Dead Online - The Naturalist
description: Created open world encounters for legendary bears, boars, and bison, giving players an opportunity for a unique cosmetic or field guide entry. Scripted the moment-to-moment gameplay interactions, worked with engineers for engine support, and collaborated with artists to get models, set dressing, and animations. Authored event locations and worked alongside teammates to test, iterate, and tune to give players an exploratory-but-satisfying experience.

title: Red Dead Online - Frontier Pursuits
description: Created random encounters for players to discover in RDO's open world. This involved scripting events to react to multiple players, handle any way players might approach it, and setting up events to spawn at engaging rates. The event in the video, Suspension Trap, is all-new for Multiplayer, which involved collaborating with artists for the NPCs, engine coders for the rope hang functionality, and the writing team for the dialogue.
